description: The CWY file is used to alter the song settings, track setup, and track scope of a .CWS song file. To change the style of song, select Song â†’ Change Style... .
Songtrix is available in bronze, silver, and gold editions, which are geared towards beginner, intermediate, and advanced users.
NOTE: The CWY file was replaced by the .STYX file with the release of Songtrix 4.
